sourcesContent:
import '../styles/four.css' const Four = () => { return (

A new fundraising and

mentorship model

Build a panel of advisors to help where your board can't


No advisory equity .We invest on the same terms as the round construct.



When do we invest

WE like to partner with founders early in their journeywhere we can add the most value


How early?

Right at the "I and my co-founder(s) were thinking that market X seems to be broken in a weird way" stage. As an example, one of our first investments was in a startup where the founder still had 8 months of college left!


Cheque Size

The combined cheque size from our network(in 2022) tends to be about $100k - $300k

Investment Tracks

Track1: If you do not have a lead investor, we are happy to take an independent call and set the terms

Track2: If you have a lead investor, we are happy to follow the terms that are already set for the round and focus on adding the value through our network


Terms

We focus ferociously on having the least amount of friction possible in round construction because we believe that nitpicking for rights at early stages does not create value for anyone

); } export default Four;
